title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 6 ยง 216.3 - Particular emissions
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 6 ยง 216.3 - Particular emissions

State Regulations

Owners or operators of any iron and/or steel process must
not cause or allow emissions of particulates from any confined process to
exceed the limits contained in Table 1 of this Part. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 6
ยง
216.3

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
